decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing an aggressive strategy with Ezio Auditore da Firenze as the commander. The goal is to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure on the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells. The deck includes a mix of versatile creatures like Noble Hierarch and True-Name Nemesis, along with powerful spells such as Swords to Plowshares and Force of Will to control the game. Additionally, there are various combo pieces like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring back key threats from the graveyard. The deck aims to win through combat damage while disrupting the opponent's game plan with countermagic and removal.

The main strategy of this deck revolves around utilizing aggressive creatures and pump spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal a large amount of damage in a short amount of time. The inclusion of fast mana sources like Simian Spirit Guide and Elvish Spirit Guide allows for explosive starts and the ability to play multiple threats in a single turn. Key cards like Berserk, Might of Old Krosa, and Temur Battle Rage can turn a small creature into a massive threat capable of taking down an opponent in just a few attacks. The deck also includes disruption in the form of removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Flame Slash, as well as hate cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon to disrupt opponent's strategies. The goal is to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out the game quickly before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with Aragorn, King of Gondor as the commander. It includes a variety of lands to ensure mana consistency and a mix of counter spells, removal, and creatures to control the battlefield. The deck aims to quickly apply pressure on the opponent and disrupt their strategies with cards like Mana Tithe, Swords to Plowshares, and Force of Will. It also includes powerful creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Hullbreacher to further dominate the game. With a mix of control elements and powerful creatures, this deck aims to outplay the opponent and secure victory through swift and decisive actions on the battlefield.

The deck focuses on utilizing Azusa, Lost But Seeking's ability to play multiple lands per turn to ramp quickly into powerful threats and lock down the opponent with control elements. It runs a high number of lands to ensure consistent land drops and takes advantage of land-based synergies such as landfall abilities and using the lands themselves as resources. The deck includes strong mana ramp cards like Birds of Paradise, Exploration, and Lotus Cobra to accelerate its game plan. It also features powerful finishers like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Emrakul, the Promised End to quickly close out games once it has established its board presence.

The deck focuses on utilizing Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd as the commander to create a strong aggro strategy. It includes a mix of creatures, equipment, and removal spells to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. The deck features various powerful creatures such as Steel Seraph, Restoration Angel, and Sanctifier en-Vec, along with equipment like Batterskull and Umezawa's Jitte to enhance their abilities. It also includes removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Council's Judgment to deal with opposing threats. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Mother of Runes and Giver of Runes to protect important creatures and ensure they can continue to attack aggressively.
